review: I love this thing and use it every day.  It's great for streaming netflix from your phone or tablet.  Not sure exactly how it works but it seems to take over streaming and the phone/tablet just acts as a remote control.  This means your batteries don't die as fast as watching it on your portable device.Setup is really easy,  I recommend if you have a USB on your tv to just power it that way.
author: Taloncard

review: Still missing some apps to cast. It does have YouTube, Hulu and Netflix. It works great and would highly recommend it for college students who want something minimal. I believe Google is still working on adding more apps to cast. It can only get better from here. Get Roku instead if you want more online channels.
author: Amelie

review: Purchased this as a gift for my son for Christmas. We're both very happy with product and functionality of the Chromecast. Works great with his TV/Soundbar and iPhone. Great value.
